name: Universita' degli Studi di Sassari
goal: L'Università di Sassari è un'università statale come tale riconosciuta ai sensi della vigente normativa. Le sue finalità sono la didattica, la ricerca e la terza missione così come definite nello Statuto dell'Autonomia pubblicato sul sito www.uniss.it
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Programmi quali Horizon2020, MSCA, LIFE, SME INstrument, Interreg. Project management.
